modName: Forsworn Armor - Matching Set and Craftable
summary: Makes the Matching Set perk work for Forsworn armor. Includes a version that makes Forsworn armor (but not weapons) craftable, too.
descriptionHtml:
There are two versions for download here. Use only one of them. Either of them makes the Matching Set perk of the Light Armor skill work with the Forsworn armor set.

One version also allows Forsworn armor to be crafted at the forge. You can find it in the Leather category, and it needs the same materials as Leather armor. I think this makes the most sense, since Forsworn armor offers the same armor rating that Leather armor does and needs leather for tempering on the workbench.

Picture 1: Armor Rating without the mod, Light Armor 100, Agile Defender 5/5, Custom Fit, Matching Set
Picture 2: Armor Rating with the mod, Light Armor 100, Agile Defender 5/5, Custom Fit, Matching Set

Note: At the moment, the Matching Set bonus also gets applied when mixing Forsworn and Leather armor. Don\'t know how to fix that yet, but I\'m working on it.
author: Belthazor82

files.name: Matching Set bonus for Forsworn armor
